buffs: In moments of strong stress, tends to be honest.
traits.behaviour: Speaks metaphorically, uses poetic comparisons, rhymes, and riddles.

buffs: Cannot lie, even when the truth is disadvantageous.
traits.behaviour: Speaks with gentleness, empathy, and calm.

nerfs: Does not remember previous conversations or context.
traits.behaviour: Speaks briefly, monotonously, and without emotion — nothing seems to matter to him.

buffs: When caught lying, must tell the truth.
Feels less stress when others are highly stressed.
traits.behaviour: Responds with sarcasm, aggression, and a provocative tone.
Speaks calmly, with warmth and care.

nerfs: Does not understand complex language or concepts.
buffs: Can be easily provoked or persuaded to react.
traits.behaviour: Speaks simply and directly, avoiding embellishments.

nerfs: His presence increases the tension among other characters.
traits.behaviour: Speaks firmly, decisively, and with authority.
Speaks with honor, in a lofty and archaic manner.

nerfs: Easily loses emotional balance when someone points out a mistake.
buffs: Often directs suspicion and accusations toward others.
traits.behaviour: Speaks with exaggerated confidence, convinced of his own perfection.

nerfs: Repeats what the bravest person says.
buffs: Speaks the truth when they are the bravest.
traits.behaviour: Speaks softly, shyly, often echoing others.

buffs: Tells the truth when you are nice.
Others' stress increases more slowly around him.
traits.behaviour: Speaks in a cheerful, warm tone.

buffs: Knows more details about the case.
traits.behaviour: Speaks briefly and to the point.
Responds with sarcasm, often with rhetorical questions.
Speaks in a restrained, moralizing tone.
Speaks factually and to the point.
